Mon:
$q 305/306 completeQuest_#Hello, do you have what I asked for?
			#$r 305 15 completeQuest_yes#Yes, I do.
			#$r 306 0 completeQuest_sorry#No, I'll be back.
			#$r 306 0 completeQuest_no#No, I'll be back.

Oh, thank you so much!
			#$b This is exactly what I needed to fix my sprinkler. Now my plants can be bright and healthy once again! 
			#$b For your hard work, here please take this. It's a ring that you should be able to trade in for immeasurable value.$h
